# File lib/grit/commit.rb, line 222
    def to_hash
      {
        'id'       => id,
        'parents'  => parents.map { |p| { 'id' => p.id } },
        'tree'     => tree.id,
        'message'  => message,
        'author'   => {
          'name'  => author.name,
          'email' => author.email
        },
        'committer' => {
          'name'  => committer.name,
          'email' => committer.email
        },
        'authored_date'  => authored_date.xmlschema,
        'committed_date' => committed_date.xmlschema,
      }
    end
